languages.text: "Главный вывод, который ему нужно сделать — это добавить почтительности и неизбывной благодарности в манеру общения с Лорд-капитаном. Только {mf|его|ее} вмешательство спасло ему голову".
"The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."
languages.original_text: "Главный вывод, который ему нужно сделать — это добавить почтительности и неизбывной благодарности в манеру общения с Лорд-капитаном. Только {mf|его|ее} вмешательство спасло ему голову".

traits.locale_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “他要做的第一件事就是，在与舰长大人打交道时，表现出永恒的感激之情。就算他做不到，也要极力表现出更加恭顺的态度。正是由于舰长大人的干预，弗拉迪姆才得以保全性命。”
languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

traits.locale_text: “他要做的第一件事就是，在与舰长大人打交道时，表现出永恒的感激之情。就算他做不到，也要极力表现出更加恭顺的态度。正是由于舰长大人的干预，弗拉迪姆才得以保全性命。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Il devrait commencer par faire preuve d'un peu plus d'égards envers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, à défaut de l'assurer de sa gratitude éternelle. Sans son intervention, il ne s'en serait jamais tiré à si bon compte. »
languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

traits.locale_text: « Il devrait commencer par faire preuve d'un peu plus d'égards envers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, à défaut de l'assurer de sa gratitude éternelle. Sans son intervention, il ne s'en serait jamais tiré à si bon compte. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lo primero que tiene que hacer es mostrar más respeto, preferiblemente su eterna gratitud, al tratar con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. A fin de cuentas, le debe su vida».
languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

traits.locale_text: «Lo primero que tiene que hacer es mostrar más respeto, preferiblemente su eterna gratitud, al tratar con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. A fin de cuentas, le debe su vida».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴラダイムが最初にしなくてはならないことは、永遠の感謝とまでは言いませんが、ロード・キャプテンに一層深い敬意を行動で示すことです。ロード・キャプテンが介入するしか、ヴラダイムの安全を確保する術はなかったのですから」
languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイムが最初にしなくてはならないことは、永遠の感謝とまでは言いませんが、ロード・キャプテンに一層深い敬意を行動で示すことです。ロード・キャプテンが介入するしか、ヴラダイムの安全を確保する術はなかったのですから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Sein erster Schritt muss sein, dem Lord Captain gegenüber größere Ehrerbietung zu zeigen, wenn nicht gar unsterblichen Dank. Die Intervention des Lord Captains hat Vladaym die Haut gerettet."
languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

traits.locale_text: "Sein erster Schritt muss sein, dem Lord Captain gegenüber größere Ehrerbietung zu zeigen, wenn nicht gar unsterblichen Dank. Die Intervention des Lord Captains hat Vladaym die Haut gerettet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

languages.text: "Yapması gereken ilk şey, Lord Kaptan'la iş ve görüşmelerinde sonsuz bir minnet ve büyük bir hürmet göstermek. Vladaym'ın hayatını kurtaran, Lord Kaptan'ın müdahalesiydi."
languages.original_text: "The first thing he must do is show greater deference, if not undying gratitude, in his dealings with the Lord Captain. It was only the Lord Captain's intervention that saved Vladaym's hide."

traits.locale_text: "Yapması gereken ilk şey, Lord Kaptan'la arasındaki meselelerde sonsuz bir minnet ve büyük bir hürmet göstermek. Vladaym'ın hayatını kurtaran, Lord Kaptan'ın müdahalesiydi."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
